summary: Completed testing of Admin Provider Delete and Provider Registration with Documents features. All 4 requested features verified successfully via backend API tests (7/7 passed) and frontend UI tests.
critical_code_review_comments: Admin delete provider endpoint (DELETE /api/admin/providers/{id}) correctly deletes provider and associated Cloudinary files
Provider registration with FormData and PDF document upload works correctly - documents are uploaded to Cloudinary
delete_from_cloudinary function correctly handles 'not found' as success (file already gone)
delete_provider_cloudinary_files helper properly cleans up profile_picture, id_verification_picture, and documents
seed_data_creation: Test providers created during testing were deleted as part of delete tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin provider delete and provider registration with documents are fully functional. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_admin_provider_delete.py can be reused for regression testing.

admin_delete_provider.details: DELETE /api/admin/providers/{id} successfully deletes provider and returns cloudinary_files_deleted count

provider_registration_with_documents.details: POST /api/auth/register with FormData and PDF documents uploads to Cloudinary successfully

cloudinary_cleanup_on_delete.details: delete_provider_cloudinary_files() properly deletes profile pictures and documents from Cloudinary

admin_providers_list.details: GET /api/admin/providers returns list of 65 providers with correct structure

registration_without_document_rejected.details: Registration without document correctly returns 400 error

delete_nonexistent_provider_404.details: DELETE for non-existent provider correctly returns 404

admin_dashboard_ui.details: Admin dashboard shows providers list, provider details panel with documents, and delete confirmation dialog
